bill_title: increase the allowable general fund cash balances for school districts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the allowable general fund cash balances for school districts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That subdivision (9) of § 13-13-10.1 be amended to read: (9) "General fund base percentage," is determined as follows: (a) Forty Fifty percent for a school district with a fall enrollment as defined in subdivision (2A) of two hundred or less; (b) Thirty Forty percent for a school district with fall enrollment as defined in subdivision (2A) of more than two hundred but less than six hundred; and (c) Twenty-five Thirty-five percent for a school district with fall enrollment as defined in subdivision (2A) greater than or equal to six hundred. When determining the general fund base percentage, the secretary of the Department of Education shall use the lesser of the school district's fall enrollment as defined in subdivision (2A) for the current school year or the school district's fall enrollment from the previous two years;

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
